title: Daredevil: Born Again Gets an Official March 2025 Release Date
description: Marvel revealed during NYCC 2024 that Daredevil: Born Again will officially premiere on Disney+ on March 4, 2025.
author: Adam Bankhurst
excerpt: Marvel revealed during NYCC 2024 that Daredevil: Born Again will officially premiere on Disney+ on March 4, 2025.
text: Return to Matt Murdock's world early next year.Marvel revealed during NYCC 2024 that Daredevil: Born Again will officially premiere on Disney+ on March 4, 2025. Vincent D'Onofrio, the actor behind Kingpin, announced the news during Marvel's NYCC panel to an enormous applause.Vincent D'Onofrio reveals #DaredevilBornAgain will premiere March 4, 2025 on Disney+. pic.twitter.com/9w12HR9rQE— Rotten Tomatoes (@RottenTomatoes) October 19, 2024 Marvel Studios previously shared the show would be arriving in March, but now we know for sure when it will arrive. When it does, it will do so as the second live-action series starring Daredevil following the Netflix show from 2015 that ran for three seasons.Charlie Cox will once again be playing Matt Murdock/Daredevil, and he will be joined by D'Onofrio, Elden Henson's Foggy Nelson, Deborah Ann Woll's Karen Page, Jon Bernthal's The Punisher, Wilson Bethel's Bullseye, and more. While we are still waiting for the public reveal of Daredevil: Born Again's trailer, those in attendance at D23 were treated to a look at the series, which included Daredevil and Kingpin sharing a tense dinner, Punisher throwing Daredevil into a locker like the school bully, an assortment of Daredevil masks, and our titular hero thrashing an almost worrying amount of bad guys. html:
Return to Matt Murdock's world early next year.

Marvel revealed during NYCC 2024 that Daredevil: Born Again will officially premiere on Disney+ on March 4, 2025.

Vincent D'Onofrio, the actor behind Kingpin, announced the news during Marvel's NYCC panel to an enormous applause.

Vincent D'Onofrio reveals #DaredevilBornAgain will premiere March 4, 2025 on Disney+. pic.twitter.com/9w12HR9rQE

— Rotten Tomatoes (@RottenTomatoes) October 19, 2024

Marvel Studios previously shared the show would be arriving in March, but now we know for sure when it will arrive. When it does, it will do so as the second live-action series starring Daredevil following the Netflix show from 2015 that ran for three seasons.

Charlie Cox will once again be playing Matt Murdock/Daredevil, and he will be joined by D'Onofrio, Elden Henson's Foggy Nelson, Deborah Ann Woll's Karen Page, Jon Bernthal's The Punisher, Wilson Bethel's Bullseye, and more.

While we are still waiting for the public reveal of Daredevil: Born Again's trailer, those in attendance at D23 were treated to a look at the series, which included Daredevil and Kingpin sharing a tense dinner, Punisher throwing Daredevil into a locker like the school bully, an assortment of Daredevil masks, and our titular hero thrashing an almost worrying amount of bad guys.

For more, check out who Matt Murdock and Wilson Fisk's new enemy is and all the other big news from NYCC!

Have a tip for us? Want to discuss a possible story? Please send an email to newstips@ign.com.

Adam Bankhurst is a writer for IGN. You can follow him on X/Twitter @AdamBankhurst and on TikTok.
